meanings.definition: A large, lively party or celebration.
meanings.sent1: Last night, we had a fun shindig with music and dancing.
meanings.sent2: The neighborhood threw a big shindig to celebrate the end of summer.
meanings.sent3: At the shindig, everyone wore colorful hats and danced joyfully.
meanings.sent4: The shindig was a whirlwind of laughter and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The shindig was so lively that even the shyest guests joined in the fun.

meanings.definition: To attend or participate in a shindig.
meanings.sent1: I can't wait to shindig with my friends at the party.
meanings.sent2: Let's shindig together at the upcoming event.
meanings.sent3: He decided to shindig all night long and enjoy every moment.
meanings.sent4: She shindigged with such enthusiasm that everyone wanted to join her.
meanings.sent5: They planned to shindig until the sun came up, celebrating life together.
